tjs.description: Adding TJS language support for Visual Studio Code
tjs.updateCtags.title: Update Ctags Index File
tjs.configuration.title: TJS Configuration
tjs.items.tagFilePath.description: Path to the Ctags' index file
tjs.items.searchPath.description: Path to the directory where ctags search tjs files
tjs.items.runOnSave.description: Whether recreate the index file automatically when tjs file is saved
tjs.items.fileExtensions.description: File extesions to be searched as tjs file
tjs.items.extraOption.description: Command-line options which will be passed to ctags
tjs.ctagsRunOnSaveLanguages.description: Languages to run ctag process whose runOnSave is true when these languages' file is saved
